history.text: hello

Hello.  
We're going to be talking about 'Batman Begins', have you seen it?
No I have not seen it. Who are the stars of the film?
It has a solid cast that includes Christian Bale, Michael Caine, Liam Neeson, Katie Homes, Gary Oldman, Rutger Hauer, and Morgan Freeman.
Cool. What is the movie about?
It is a superhero movie.  It relaunches the Batman movie franchise.  Providing his origin, and an early adventure.  It is a good 'jumping on' point for the movie & comic book franchise.
When was the movie released?
It came out in 2005.
Who is the main villain in the movie?
There are two villains in this Batman movie.  One is Ra's al Ghul, the other is the Scarecrow.
Sounds interesting. How long does the movie last?
I'm not sure.
Oh ok
Where does the movie take place?
The fictional city of 'Gotham City', the home to Bruce Wayne/Batman.
Does Batman have any sidekicks in the movie?
Not sidekicks.  He has allies, or a supporting cast.  Most notably in Alfred Pennyworth (Michael Caine) and James Gordon (Gary Oldman).
Does Batman/Bruce Wayne have a love interest in the movie?
I don't know that I'd call it a love interest.  The character of Rachel Dawes (Katie Holmes) plays the female lead, and there's some romantic tension (suspense) there.
Gotcha. That sounds interesting
It is a good movie, even if the superhero genre doesn't interest you.  If you have any interest in director Christopher Nolan's other movies, it is likely you'll enjoy this.
Oh wow. I didn't know that Christopher Nolan was the director!
Yes, from 'American Psycho' to the 'Batman' franchise (and beyond).
Who plays Alfred in this film? I saw a lot of well known actors but none of them that strike me as Alfred(and he's a pretty key character).
That role is played by Michael Caine.
Ah ok. That makes sense.
I really think I would enjoy this movie.
It is a well (and impressively) cast movie, and the reactions to it show.  Well reviewed and rated.
Do you have information on the rating it got on Rotten Tomatoes?
I know that is pretty random but its a pretty reliable site for ratings on movies

Rotten Tomatoes had it at 84%, the 'average' is listed as 7.7 (out of 10)
.
Still a pretty good score.
Thanks for all the info! I appreciate it!
Yes, it also received a Metacritic score of 70/100, and a CenemaScore of 'A'.  No problem.

uid2response.feedback: I would watch because I got all the details of the cast, director, and plot. I also got some good information about the reviews the movie had. It was highly rated and I also like the superhero genre.
